Texts.Eng: Don't forget to upgrade this station whenever you have the resources to do so. It is absolutely worth the effort.

With an ^orange;Armorworks^reset; you can start really delving into combat. As you upgrade this station, you'll gain access to a ^orange;huge variety^reset; of weapons and armors. You'll even uncover alien weapons from other realities! Try building an ^orange;armorworks^orange; now.
